{variant.name}_{category.name}.long_description: {variant}. 5-year ACS estimates in provided census geolevels. For non-census geolevels (such as zip codes), spatial overlaps are calculated between census block groups and {category}. Redistribution to non-census geolevels was performed using the redistribute R package.

sources.name: American Community Survey
sources.location: 5-Year estimates, table S0101, via the API

parcels.long_description: parcels, then the value of each block group is divided across all living units within each intersecting parcel. Once parcel-level values are assigned, spatial overlaps are calculated between parcels and target regions such that parcel values can be aggregated to each intersecting target region based on proportion of overlap.

direct.long_description: target regions, then the value of each block group is aggregated/disaggregated to any intersecting target region based on proportion of overlap.

pop_male.short_description: The count of males in population using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2010/2021 5-year estimates.
pop_male.long_description: The count of males in the total population using {category.name}-method.

pop_female.short_description: The count of females in population using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2010/2021 5-year estimates.
pop_female.long_description: The count of females in the total population using {category.name}-method.

perc_male.short_description: The percent of males in the total population using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
perc_male.long_description: The percent of males in the total population using {category.name}-method.
perc_male.statement: The percent of males is {value} in {region_name}.

perc_female.short_description: The percent of females in the total population using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
perc_female.long_description: The percent of females in the total population using {category.name}-method.
perc_female.statement: The percent of females is {value} in {region_name}.

total_pop.short_description: Total count of the population using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
total_pop.long_description: Total count of the population using {category.name}-method.
total_pop.statement: Total count of the population is {value} in {region_name}.
